section.title: Verify Matahari Build
section.para: It's always a good idea to build and test the existing code to make sure no problems crop up before attempting to develop an agent. There are 2 commands provided for cross compilation.

Once building is complete our unittest's should run automatically on the Linux platform. Before beginning the journey to create an agent make sure that these core unit test never fail.
Windows builds will need their unittests run on a Windows host.
